title: How to Make Ginger Tea (Korean Style)

steps.headline: Get a piece of ginger and peel off the peel with a spoon or a knife.
Wash the piece of ginger well and then start grinding it.
Mix a cup or a few tablespoons of honey (depending on how much of ginger you ground) into the ground ginger mix.
Save it as needed.
steps.description: If you want to use it as a gift or to save it in the refrigerator, pour it into a jar and close the lid tightly.

steps.headline: Enjoy it!
steps.description: If you want to drink it cold, pour some cold water or ice cubes into the drink and enjoy the refreshing result. If you want it hot, pour some hot water into the drink; this part is optional but if you like it to be tastier then you can add some pine nuts.

steps.headline: Flavor it to taste.
steps.description: If the drink itself is too spicy or not sweet enough, add some more honey and you can also try adding some lime or lemon drops. It also makes it tastier!

text: Get a piece of ginger and peel off the peel with a spoon or a knife.  Wash the piece of ginger well and then start grinding it.  Mix a cup or a few tablespoons of honey (depending on how much of ginger you ground) into the ground ginger mix.  Save it as needed. If you want to use it as a gift or to save it in the refrigerator, pour it into a jar and close the lid tightly. Enjoy it! If you want to drink it cold, pour some cold water or ice cubes into the drink and enjoy the refreshing result. If you want it hot, pour some hot water into the drink; this part is optional but if you like it to be tastier then you can add some pine nuts. Flavor it to taste. If the drink itself is too spicy or not sweet enough, add some more honey and you can also try adding some lime or lemon drops. It also makes it tastier!
